reviewText: It was a crazy funny movie of old loved watching slapstick comedy.. no dirt
Not a very good copy, not a very good movie
If your in to B&W flicks, this is a must have for your collection. Definately goodHillbilly Blitzkrieg old fashion comedy!
One of the Monogram Barney Google-Snuffy Smith films.  The Alpha print is acceptable with the usual splices, etc.
Really liked watching this old movie

Enjoyed the simplicity of the movie along with the comedy. Comparing comedy from  decades past compared to current comedy, I'll take the decades old comedy any day, there is no worry about cursing, subjective sexual remarks etc. Thank you Amazon for streaming the old pre-1950's movies.  I only wish there were more "westerns" to choose from.
I shutter to think who the audience was for this monstrosity!

This is a good old movie.  I watched it on Amazon prime and enjoyed the good clean humor. It is well worth watching again.
The movie was clear all the way through which was amazing. So many of the old movies are faded and hard to watch.

Yep, nazi spies have infiltrated the Great Smokey Mountains, and only turnip-nosed, Snuffy Smith can stop them! He's -somehow- made it into the army, and is -somehow- stationed near his fellow hillbillies. The spies are up to no good, but have no fear! Snuffy -somehow- winds up inside a top secret rocket! Sound ludicrous? Well, if the title, HILLBILLY BLITZKRIEG, isn't enough of a tip-off, there's just no hope! Inane, harmless fun, from a time long before irony and / or cynicism became the norm...
